<< imag elementary functions invhilb >>

ind2sub

Linear index to matrix subscript values

Syntax

[row, col] = ind2sub(sz, ind)
[I1, I2, ..., In] = ind2sub(sz, ind)

Input argument

sz

size of array: vector of positive integers.

ind

linear indices.

Output argument

row

row subscripts.

col

column subscripts.

I1, I2, ..., In

multidimensional subscripts.

Description

ind2sub converts linear indices to subscript.

Example

ind = [4 5 6 7];
sz = [4 4];
[row,col] = ind2sub(sz,ind)

See also

sub2ind.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
